```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
preen <- read_csv("preening data/peafowl_preening_data.csv")
```
```{r}
preen %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=weight, y=back_preening, color=sex))+
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
preen %>%
  group_by(sex) %>%
  summarise(mean_weight=mean(weight, na.rm=T)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=sex, y=mean_weight))+
  geom_col()
```
